input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Tourna Mens Tennis Glove - Half Finger

Item specifications:
This unique patented design provides a non-slip grip, maximum comfort and absorbs shock, giving each player total control and extended playing time with less hand fatigue during their game.
The synthetic leather construction is combined with a cool mesh back that provides a responsive feel and that also reduces heat and increases overall breathability.
Available for Right or Left hand in Small (S), Meduim (M), Large (L) or Extra Large (XL)
Men's Half Glove

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, a series for preschoolers, debuted in May 2006 and became the highest rated Playhouse Disney premier ever. Disney's favorite characters interact with kids to stimulate problem solving. Dress up as Mickey or Minnie Mouse with some fun and innovative Disguise costumes! Now Mom and Dad can dress up with the kids for that great Disney family experience!. This item comes with one pair of Mickey mouse light up gloves.
input_text.Response B: Is there a man in your life that plays tennis? Give him a gift he'll love! Tourna Mens Tennis Glove-Half Finger has a  unique patented design providing a non-slip grip, maximum comfort, and absorbing shock, giving each player total control and extended playing time with less hand fatigue during their game. The synthetic leather construction is combined with a cool mesh back that provides a responsive feel that also reduces heat and increases overall breathability. These gloves are available for right or left hands in sizes small, medium, large or extra large.
